Text.text: As in the previous example, the context of the field contained in the table is related to the entity set 'childWithSE'. This entity set gets global SideEffects. When the user presses Enter in this field, SAP Fiori elements executes this SideEffects. The back-end messages are displayed on the targeted property and are added into the message view.
To generate a back-end message, select the row and execute the action 'Generate Message'.
